name: Autoscroller - Custom Transparency Until Hovered
description:
Makes the AutoScroller more transparent than Firefox's default, and will make it almost-opaque when you hover over it.

* Thanks for the code user 4, upon which modified a bit

* Thanks to user 6431 for introducing me into the realm of Transparency with style 6771

Features:
+ Puts more focus on the web page, by making the autoscroller almost invisible, until hovered over

Integrates with Style 8885

Keywords:
Page scrolling, scroll, see through see-thru, auto-scroller

Works on Firefox Versions:
+ Firefox3

Changelog:
1.0.0.1
+ Updated code to work on Firefox 3.1 (Shiretoko) - No longer uses -moz-opacity, it is now just opacity.
